structure.unit: SCHOOL EMPLOYEES -- TEACHERS' RETIREMENT AND TENURE

law.catch_line: Superintendent eligible for continuing contract status.
law.text: The superintendent shall be eligible for continuing contract status when he meets all requirements prescribed in KRS 161.720 to 161.810 for continuing contracts for teachers.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 615, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 98, sec. 1.
